thread.section_title: Barking Mad Dog Care Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.barkingmad.uk.com
thread.title: Simon
thread.title_full: Barking Mad Dog Care reviewed by Simon

author: Simon
title: Simon
text:
What can we say?
As the 'Barking Mad' transport arrives all our 3 dogs jump aboard without hesitation.
I think they know they are going on their holiday üêæ and couldn't wait to go so, I suppose that speaks volumes really.
We have been using Barking Mad for many years and have always found the service professional in every way, our girls are happy to go and are full of it when they return.
It's a comfort to know they are looked after and cared for in a home from home environment.
Barking Mad are kind, flexible, meet our dogs needs and communicate well. I would recommend them every time.
Lucy is very committed and genuinely cares for all our dogs and all her hosts and she matches them well.
We feel so lucky with the service and would like to say 'thank you' to Lucy and all her hosts!
Woof woof woof üêæ
